akn:section.akn:heading: Investigations of flag officers and Senior Executive Service employees

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 2511. Investigations of flag officers and Senior Executive Service employees In conducting an investigation into an allegation of misconduct by a flag officer or member of the Senior Executive Service serving in the Coast Guard, the Inspector General of the Department of Homeland Security shall—(1) conduct the investigation in a manner consistent with Department of Defense policies for such an investigation; and
(2) consult with the Inspector General of the Department of Defense.
(Added Pub. L. 114–120, title II, § 220(a), Feb. 8, 2016, 130 Stat. 48, § 430; renumbered § 2511, Pub. L. 115–282, title I, § 114(b), Dec. 4, 2018, 132 Stat. 4223.)
